detectors.description:
Crowdsale.constructor(uint256,uint256,uint256,address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#128-137) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(_startTime >= 0) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#129)
Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#144-153) ignores return value by token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#150)
YobCoinCrowdsale.extraMint(uint256) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#204-207) ignores return value by token.mint(owner,_amount) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#205)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#144-153):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#150)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#151)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.buyTokens(address)](repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#L144-L153):
	External calls:
	- [token.mint(beneficiary,tokens)](repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#L150)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#L151)

	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#24)

	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU2.sol#24)
